divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my parents and we were going home. My mom was the one who saw it first and told us so we reversed and it took off. Something weird definitely not a plane. Kind of scary. It was a triangle shaped dark black with losts of lights right on top of a football field with football field lights on. I was freaking out but somewhat excited because I had never seen anything like it before. It took off going north bound and left pretty fast.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Laredo
There were no other sightings in Laredo on or around November 18th 2013
Summary: triangle shaped with lots of lights in the back. Never before seen something like it.
